thought.text: Let me try a different approach. Since the issue is specifically with the modeling module, let me see if I can work around the build issues by directly testing the separability functionality:

action.command:
cd /tmp/tmpqboi531g/astropy && python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, '.')
try:
    from astropy.modeling import models as m
    from astropy.modeling.separable import separability_matrix
    print('Successfully imported modeling modules')
except Exception as e:
    print('Import error:', e)
"

function.name: execute_bash
